author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam shares his experience with the Smarter Scrubber, a unique barbeque grill scrubber designed by Destin from Smarter Every Day as an experiment in local manufacturing. It's a fascinating product that's the culmination of over four years of engineering and testing, and tells an important story about  how everyday products are made today. 

SmarterEveryDay's video about the Smarter Scrubber Experiment: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ZTGwcHQfLY
The Smarter Scrubber: https://www.jjgeorgestore.com/the-smarter-scrubber/

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: What's Special About this BBQ Grill Scrubber
